name: ground-school-single-page-app
description: This is a single page application that provides information about ground school, a sign in page, pricing and blog.  ## How to Run    Open the files with a local server to run. I used npx http-server inside the local files. ## Roadmap of future improvements   I would like to make it so the search bar is actually functional to find things on the site. I also want to update the blog page so that it includes links to actual blog posts.  ## License MIT License
